audio_sermons.title: True vs. False Conversions
audio_sermons.description: What is the difference between True and False Conversions?  Israel received God as their deliverer but most never knew Him; likewise many who claim to be Christians still serve other gods and have no true salvation.   Have you come to God on His terms or based on a false Gospel?  Are you really saved?  In this message,  discover how we can measure our conversion experiences against God's Word.
